text: awlm yatabayan lhwla' almukadhibin llrswl: kam 'ahlakna min qablihim min al'umam alssabiqat yamshun fi msaknhm, fyshahdwnha eianana kqwm hud wasalih wlwt? 'iina fi dhalik layat wezat yustdall biha ealaa sidq alrusul alty ja'thm, wbtlan maa hum ealayh min alshrk, 'afala yasmae hwla' almukadhibun bialrusul mwaez allah whjjh, fyntfewn bha?
